title: TUI panic: slice bounds out of range in truncate function
description:
Runtime panic in TUI when rendering history:

```
runtime error: slice bounds out of range [:-3]
```

Stack trace shows:
- `internal/tui/components/queue.go:121` - `truncate()` function
- `internal/tui/components/history.go:75` - `renderHistory()`

The truncate function likely tries to slice `s[:len(s)-3]` when the string is less than 3 characters, resulting in a negative slice bound.

Fix: Add bounds check in truncate function to handle short strings.
close_reason: Fixed: truncate function now handles max <= 0 by returning empty string
